title: [Large-Scale] Gamification-Based Strategies for Enhancing Language Learning Effectiveness

context.prior_knowledge: Possession of basic language skills, no gamification experience
context.additional_context: Aims to enhance language skills required in actual workplaces, improving immersion through game-based learning.

learning_goals: Learners can utilize 20 expressions necessary for practical language contexts (meetings, negotiations, email writing, etc.) through game-based activities
Learners can correct over 80% of their language usage errors based on in-game feedback
Learners can explain at least three connections between peer evaluation in project-based assessments and game-based learning experiences
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
